section.title: Deleting All Snapshots
section.para: CloudForms Management Engine enables you to delete snapshots when you no longer need them.

step.para: From InfrastructureVirtual Machines, click on the virtual machine that you want to remove all snapshots from.
From the Properties area, click snapshots.

Click
(Delete Snapshots), and then
(Delete All Existing Snapshots).

note.para: The snapshot deletion process can be followed under Settings & Operations TasksMy Other UI Tasks. If new snapshots have made the virtual machine unusable, you can revert it from the CloudForms Management Engine console.
